name: my dataset name
author: My name

__prompts__.gated_dataset: Do you want to enable User Access requests?
__prompts__.disable_viewer: Do you want to disable dataset preview on the dataset page?
__prompts__.splits: How many splits does your dataset have (train,val,test)?
__prompts__.task_category: Which task category does your dataset fall into?
__prompts__.task: What task will this dataset be used for?
__prompts__.autotrain: Enable train and evaluation info for AutoTrain or Evaluation on model Hub (https://huggingface.co/autotrain)
__prompts__.metric: Which metric do you want to use for AutoTrain or Evaluation on model Hub?
__prompts__.url: url pointing to the dataset file
__prompts__.name: name of the dataset
__prompts__.author: name of the dataset author
__prompts__.citation: citation for the dataset (use \n for line breaks)
